actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A resolution to rename the Big Stone National Wildlife Refuge to be known as the Lem Kaercher National Wildlife Refuge.

summary.text: Directs the Department of the Interior to rename the Big Stone National Wildlife Refuge, Minnesota, as the Lem Kaercher National Wildlife Refuge.

titles.title: A resolution to rename the Big Stone National Wildlife Refuge to be known as the Lem Kaercher National Wildlife Refuge.
